text:
We're moving the launch to tomorrow!

We discovered technical issues that require resolution before we can deliver the experience you deserve. 

Rest assured that everyone that is whitelisted and meet the criteria will be able to mint.

We appreciate your patience as we fix things.

[Telegram Apps Center](https://x.com/tappscenter) stickers are now live in the Fuse Mini App, ready to mint, collect, and carry inside Telegram.

Start minting → [LINK](https://t.me/fuse/store?startapp=collection_71162d8d-e161-4f18-b931-8b0aec44b51f)

The whitelist for the USYK Collection is closing soon.

Two ways to enter before it ends:

1️⃣ [Ready to Pay Mini App](https://t.me/RT_Pay_bot?start=UmpobEtaQw) → Deposit $50 = guaranteed spot

2️⃣ [Fuse Mini App](https://t.me/fuse/store?startapp=collection_558b9db3-3a26-41d8-8840-d462b3748f5d) → Join the raffle

Be early. Be a part of [U](https://x.com/usykaa)[SYK](https://x.com/usykaa).
